channel.title: Hao Research Group of Accelerator Physics
channel.description: Nonlinearity, HP computation and Statistical learning

item.title: DOE HEP Accelerator Stewardship Awarded
item.dc:creator: yuehao
item.description: Our group is awarded Accelerator Stewardship program of DOE High energy physics, on the research work of nonlinear dynamics study using square matrix method.
item.content:encoded: Our group is awarded Accelerator Stewardship program  of DOE High energy physics, on the research work of nonlinear dynamics study using square matrix method.

item.title: DOE NP funds awarded
item.dc:creator: yuehao
item.description: Our group is supported by NP FOA funds, towards understanding beam-beam effect of future electron-ion collider.
item.content:encoded: Our group is supported by NP FOA funds, towards understanding beam-beam effect of future electron-ion collider.

item.title: New Students
item.dc:creator: yuehao
item.description: MSU Graduate student Michael Balcewicz and Elliot Lu joined the group as Graduate Student Research Assistant.
item.content:encoded: MSU Graduate student Michael Balcewicz and Elliot Lu joined the group as Graduate Student Research Assistant.
